testCaseProjectId.title: Test Case Project ID
testCaseProjectId.description: YouTrack project ID where test cases are stored as issues

testRunProjectId.title: Test Run Project ID
testRunProjectId.description: YouTrack project ID where test runs are stored as issues

testCaseIssueType.title: Test Case Issue Type
testCaseIssueType.description: Issue type name for test cases (e.g., 'Test Case')

testRunIssueType.title: Test Run Issue Type
testRunIssueType.description: Issue type name for test runs (e.g., 'Test Run')

testSuiteCustomFieldName.title: Test Suite Custom Field Name
testSuiteCustomFieldName.description: Name of the custom field used to store test suites
